House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on Resolin Red F3BS components I and II.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on N-(2-((2,6-dicyano-4-methylphenyl)azo)-5-(diethylamino phenyl)-methanesulfonamide and N-(2-((2,6-dicyano-4-methylphenyl)azo)-5- (di-l-propylamino) phenyl)-methanesulfonamide (Resolin Red F3BS Components I and II).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on Resolin Red F3BS components I and II.
